name: Egyptian Expedition
story: The year is 1923. You are Dr. Alexandra Kane, a renowned archaeologist who has just received a cryptic telegram about an extraordinary discovery in the Egyptian desert. The sender claims to have found something that will 'rewrite history itself.' Armed with your expertise and a thirst for knowledge, you must navigate the mysteries of ancient secrets and modern dangers.

locations.Cairo Hotel: A grand colonial hotel where foreign expeditions gather. The lobby buzzes with whispered conversations and shadowy figures.
locations.Desert Camp: Your temporary archaeological camp, surrounded by endless dunes and the remnants of ancient civilizations.
locations.Hidden Temple: A recently uncovered temple complex, its hieroglyphs still vibrant despite millennia of burial.
locations.Underground Chamber: A mysterious chamber deep beneath the temple, filled with artifacts that shouldn't exist.
locations.Local Market: A bustling bazaar where information, supplies, and ancient artifacts change hands.

Hassan.name: Hassan
Hassan.description: A weathered Bedouin guide with knowledge of the desert's hidden secrets. His eyes hold ancient wisdom.

Professor Blackwood.name: Professor Blackwood
Professor Blackwood.description: A brilliant but ruthless colleague who seems to know more about your expedition than he should.

Amara.name: Amara
Amara.description: A enigmatic trader who deals in both legal artifacts and forbidden knowledge. She speaks in riddles.

The Messenger.name: The Messenger
The Messenger.description: A hooded figure who sent the original telegram. Their identity remains hidden behind shadows.

triggers: The telegram must be decoded before the temple entrance can be found. Hassan holds crucial information.
The ancient device in the Underground Chamber cannot be activated until three specific artifacts are collected from different locations.
Professor Blackwood's true intentions are revealed only after the temple entrance is discovered.
The chamber can only be unsealed by solving a puzzle that requires knowledge from Amara's riddles.
opening_prompt: The desert wind carries whispers of ancient secrets as you arrive at your hotel in Cairo. The cryptic telegram burns in your pocket, its mysterious message haunting your thoughts: 'The stars align as they did when the old gods walked among mortals. What was lost shall be found, but beware - some knowledge comes at a price.' Your adventure into the unknown begins now.
